title: Rajini Murugan (title track) Lyrics Rajini Murugan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Rajini Murugan (title track) Song Lyrics
Singer(s): Sivakarthikeyan

kokkarakko kozhi koova
konda seval kuththu poda
kootthadikka
vandhirukken murugan

Rajini murugan
Gan gan gan gan
Rajini murugan
gan gan gan gan

dandanakkura thaalaththoda
dappaakuththu aattaththoda
vandhu nikkura
un nanban murugan

Rajini Murugan
gan gan gan gan
Rajini Murugan
gan gan gan gan

naalai enna
aagummunu feeling illa
oru rooba kooda
pocketula saving illa

kaala neram
paarthu kaaththu
veesavilla.
Karuththoda vazha
aasappatta over tholla.

kavala yedhum enaku illa
pangu pangu
thalayil magudam
tharichidaadha
king-u king-u   (2)

summa paaththaalum
lollukiraanga
paala kudichaalum
kallungiraanga

Dhillaa jeichchaalum
luckunkiraanga.
Sixer adichchaalum
duckkunkirainga

malli vaasam
enga ullathula
veesum
oru podhum naanga
illa illa illa
mosam

attakaasam
alavillaa semma
paasam
podhuvaa sonna
naanga konjam
viththiyaasam.

Kalangaama vazhum
naanga thani
koottam.
kadan kettaakkaa
edupomey ottam

Rajini Murugan
gan gan gan gan
Rajini Murugan
gan gan gan gan

Vesam podaama
pesi sirippom.
Osi tea vaangi
onnaa kudippom

koottu seerndhaale
veetta marappom
gumbalaa naanga
toppu adippom.

sittu pola
tharikettu thara mela
dhinam suththiduvom
engalukku idhaan
vela.

pattu sela, adha
katti varum girla
oravaakkikolla
ennum ennum enga
moola.

marakkaama naanga
veedhi thorum
nippom.

Mora maamanaaga
nenja ezhuthi
veppom.

kokkarakko kozhi koova
konda seval kuththu poda
kootthadikka
vandhirukken murugan

Rajini murugan
Gan gan gan gan
Rajini murugan
gan gan gan gan

dandanakkura thaalaththoda
dappaakuththu aattaththoda
vandhu nikkura
un nanban murugan

kavala yedhum enaku illa
pangu pangu
thalayil magudam
tharichidaadha
king-u king-u   (2)

seo.description: Get the complete Rajini Murugan (title track) Lyrics Rajini Murugan Song Lyrics from Rajini Murugan. Read the lyrics penned by Yugabharathi and composed by D Imman and sung by Siva Karthikeyan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
